title: Alphabet Plans Sale, Spinoff of Verily Unit, Executive Says
description: Alphabet Inc. has been working for the past two years to technologically decouple its life sciences unit Verily so that it can be sold or spun off, a senior executive testified Thursday.

title: OpenAI, Anthropic Highlight AI’s Economic Value as Doubts Grow
description: OpenAI, Anthropic and other startups are attempting to provide more clarity on how AI performs in the workplace. But first…

title: Microsoft Expands Clean-Power Deals With Japan’s Shizen Energy
description: Microsoft Corp. has signed a new batch of renewable energy deals with Japan-based Shizen Energy Inc., the latest effort by a global technology company to secure clean electricity.
